snippet: At least one other worker was critically injured when a roof or ceiling fell on workers at a building under construction in Fort Greene.
abstract: At least one other worker was critically injured when a roof or ceiling fell on workers at a building under construction in Fort Greene.

byline.original: By NATE SCHWEBER and ANDY NEWMAN

headline.main: Worker Killed in Brooklyn Building Collapse
headline.print_headline: Bricklayer Killed in Brooklyn Floor Collapse
